00058 Symbol* createSymbol( int st, int ic, int le, int fp, vector<int> *aVector ) //make a new symbol with passed values
00059 {
00060         Symbol *versionOne = new Symbol( );
00061         versionOne->setSymbolType( st );
00062         versionOne->setIntercharGap( ic );
00063         versionOne->setLeadingElement( le );
00064         versionOne->setForcedPosition( fp );
00065         versionOne->setEncodedData( *aVector );
00066         return versionOne;
00067 }
00068 
00069 void testSymbol( Symbol *testSymbol ) //Output the values of a Symbol object to standard output
00070 {
00071         cout << "Unit Test - Symbol" << endl;
00072         cout << "Symbol Type: " << testSymbol->getSymbolType( ) << endl;
00073         cout << "Leading Element: " << testSymbol->getLeadingElement( ) << endl;
00074         cout << "IC Gap: " << testSymbol->getIntercharGap( ) << endl;
00075         cout << "Force Position: " << testSymbol->getForcePostion( ) << endl;
00076         cout << "Data: ";
00077         for ( int ii = 0; ii < testSymbol->getEncodedData( )->size( ); ii++ ) 
00078         {
00079                 cout << testSymbol->getEncodedData( )->at( ii ) << " ";
00080         }
00081         cout << endl;
00082         cout << endl;
00083 }

00085 char* getXMLToParse( string *fileTitle ) //Safely get the XML file into a c_string
00086 {
00087         char *ft = new char[ fileTitle->length( ) + 1 ];
00088         strcpy( ft, fileTitle->c_str( ) );
00089         ifstream xmlfile ( ft, ios::in );
00090         
00091         vector<string> xmlcontent;
00092         string xmlentry;
00093         string xmltoparse;
00094         
00095         if ( xmlfile.is_open( ) )                                                       //open the file
00096         {
00097                 while ( getline( xmlfile, xmlentry ) )                  //get the data
00098                 {
00099                         xmlcontent.push_back( xmlentry + "\n" );        //add data to vector
00100                 }
00101                 xmlfile.close( );
00102                 
00103                 for ( int i = 0; i < xmlcontent.size( ); i++ )  //iterate through vector into string
00104                 {
00105                         xmltoparse += xmlcontent[ i ];
00106                 }
00107         }
00108         
00109         char * cxml = new char [ xmltoparse.size( ) + 1 ];      //copy string into cstring
00110         strcpy ( cxml, xmltoparse.c_str( ) );
00111         
00112         return cxml;
00113 }

00115 void testDOM ( xml_node< > *node ) //Test contents of a single named or unnamed node in the DOM
00116 {
00117                 cout << node->name( ) << ":";
00118                 xml_node< > *datanode = node->first_node( );
00119                 while (datanode != 0) 
00120                 {
00121                         cout << " - " << datanode->name( );
00122                         xml_node< > *childnode = datanode->first_node( );
00123                         while (childnode != 0) 
00124                         {
00125                                 cout << childnode->name( ) << " is " << childnode->value( );
00126                                 childnode = childnode->next_sibling( );
00127                         }
00128                         datanode = datanode->next_sibling();
00129                 }
00130                 cout << endl;
00131                 node = node->next_sibling( );
00132 }
00133 
00134 vector<string> returnDOMValues( xml_node< > *node ) //Return contents of a single named or unnamed node in the DOM
00135 {
00136         vector<string> *returnValues = new vector<string>;
00137         //cout << node->name( ) << ":";
00138         xml_node< > *datanode = node->first_node( );
00139         while ( datanode != 0 ) 
00140         {
00141                 //cout << " - " << datanode->name( );
00142                 xml_node< > *childnode = datanode->first_node( );
00143                 while ( childnode != 0 ) 
00144                 {
00145                         //cout << childnode->name( ) << " is " << childnode->value( );
00146                         string aValue = childnode->value( );
00147                         returnValues->push_back( aValue );
00148                         childnode = childnode->next_sibling( );
00149                 }
00150                 datanode = datanode->next_sibling( );
00151         }
00152         //cout << endl;
00153         node = node->next_sibling( );
00154         
00155         return *returnValues;
00156 }
